outputs.output_descr: This will be achieved through provision of integrated package of services towards creating enabling environment for sustainable local economic development The Programme will actively facilitate knowledge exchange among communities, civil society, the private sector and the Government, and improve access to various financial services and SME mechanisms

Supporting youth participation and involvement in a positive way will offer a renewed sense of civic purpose, disincentives for violent activity, and reduce the risk of renewed violence in Osh and Jalal-Abad. The interventions will also contribute to preparing the ground for a national reconciliation process and peaceful resolution of inter-ethnic tensions through the principles of human rights. It aims to directly contribute to the efforts of the Government of Kyrgyzstan to promote inter-ethnic trust and harmony within the country.

project_descr: The Programme will actively contribute to increasing the sustainability of economic activities of poor population at the local and national levels
